channel.title: 400+ Client&Source
channel.description: Hello, ;) I am searching for a Client&Source which have Pest control, working d claws spec and real skillcape emotes. Maybe if it's possible, I want one with working ranged and magic(lunar is not needed) in it. Most of the servers have working combat, but then, when you want to try the ranged skill, you'll find out that you'll have to stay in front of your enemy to shoot your arrow :P I am already searching for a while, but i can't find a source and client which have what i like. :| If you have a client and source with this in it, Can you send me? :D Thanks in advance :P

item.title: 400+ Client&Source
item.dc:creator: @Pascalrs2 Pascalrs2
item.description:
@Pascalrs2 wrote:

Hello,
I am searching for a Client&Source which have Pest control, working d claws spec and real skillcape emotes.
Maybe if it’s possible, I want one with working ranged and magic(lunar is not needed) in it.
Most of the servers have working combat, but then, when you want to try the ranged skill, you’ll find out that you’ll have to stay in front of your enemy to shoot your arrow
I am already searching for a while, but i can’t find a source and client which have what i like.
If you have a client and source with this in it, Can you send me?
Thanks in advance

Read full topic
